content: Congratulations to @Ashwin Iyengar for getting what I think is his first PR into mathlib -- adding nonarchimedean topological groups and rings. This work gets us one step closer to things like rigid spaces in the sense of Tate and adic spaces in the sense of Huber. The build is failing -- I don't know why.
I think it's not a problem with this PR. bors is really struggling at the moment.

I think the current theory is that the second build failure is from #6496. (The first build failure was spurious: https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/113488-general/topic/install.20azcopy.20step.20failing).

So nothing to worry about (yet).
